I'd like to run it in Tails as well but couldn't figure it out, too.
> [defrag](#comment_4_1FBFntSrJYhDuQhSsr1duVRGa45DyWnAem): Zeronet isn't another Tor lol.I don't really think it would increase it so much.
Right, it isn't "another" Tor but that's not the point. Zeronet can use Tor to improve anonymity. And using Zeronet on Tails would increase anonymity by eliminating the factor of an possible compromised operating system. It also could prevent leaks by some malicious java script due to its strict firewall which tunnels everything through Tor. And even more, it prevents from configuring errors since everyone can use Tails safely with just a little bit of common sense and you don't have to be a linux /  computer / security / expert.

Please stop LOLing if you don't know what you talk about
